DOC.brief_summary: Phase 1 clinical trial for the safety and dose determination of Pneumostem (human umbilical cord blood derived mesenchymal stem cells) in the premature infants with intraventricular hemorrhage (IVH, grade 3-4)
DOC.brief_title: Phase 1 Clinical Trial of PNEUMOSTEMÂ® Treatment in Premature Infants With Intraventricular Hemorrhage
DOC.criteria: 2334w IVH grade 34, confirmed with brain ultrasonogram within 7 days after IVH diagnosis severe congenital anomaly intrauterine intracranial bleeding intracranial infection severe congenital infection active and uncontrolled infection, CRP>10mg/dl Platelet count <50,000/ml severe metabolic acidosis (PH<7.1, BE<20)
